Title: Banking Almanac (Banks And Financial Institutions Of Bangladesh 2016)
Author: ড. সালেহউদ্দিন আহমেদ
Summary:
"Banking Almanac (Banks And Financial Institutions Of Bangladesh 2016)"
Impressive growth and expansion in the banking and financial sector in Bangladesh has been inseparable from the overall growth of the economy of Bangladesh ever since her independence in 1971. The catalytic role played by these institutions in mobilizing savings, facilitating investment and promoting trade and commerce, has undoubtedly been of far reaching significance. Bangladeshi banks and financial institutions have also emerged as important instruments in the implementation of the government's monetary and investments policy. 
The Banking Almanac, is the first important publication of its type, compiling information and data on the banks and financial institutions of Bangladesh. The compilation will be useful for all those looking for comparable details on institutional setup, spatial coverage, capital base, product range and CSR activities, amongst others, of these institutions. The publication of the Almanac has been supported by the Bangladesh Bank and overseen by a Board of Editors consisting of specialists in the sector, economists, academics and eminent researchers.
Book_Title: Banking Almanac (Banks And Financial Institutions Of Bangladesh 2016)
